name: catch-a-fish
description: At the beginning it was a simple aquarium with some fishes and shark disappearing when you hover them. ## Now It is a game with randomly spawning fishes, which you should catch. You can start the game by clicking "Play" button or pressing "Space" or "Enter".  When you click a fish, it disappears and you earn 1 point. You have 15 seconds to earn as many points as you can!
author: Roman Meshkov
